data.message: Hello FacebookHelp me hack the Facebook of my bestfriend I can not recover because of the Code number that the number is saved on facebook of my bestfriend no matter how it works so please help me because of security I can not open it

replies.message: Hey Miguel. If your friend can't get into their account because it was taken over by someone else, please tell them to go to the Hacked Accounts section at http://bit.ly/2vycjaY to get immediate help. You can also encourage them to visit Privacy Basics at http://bit.ly/2tcgHLY for tips and guides to help them keep their account secure. -Ashley

Hello Facebook the hard way i can not fix it so you can fix it when I give you my bestfriend account so you can delete its security number code ?? He tried fixing that he recovered from yahoo problem when logging in I have security blocking so i can not open please help me I can not fix it ????
